The growth of interconnected devices has led to an enormous volume of temporal data that requires specialized compression models for efficient storage. Cerebral palsy (CP) is the most common physical disability affecting children, often resulting in reduced quality of life due to challenges with movement control, posture, balance, and increased energy expenditure required to walk.
